website_summaries.verdict: Dainty-patterned, bone china creamer and sugar bowl set, which can be coordinated with other pieces in the collection.
pros: Very delicate and feminine pattern on this creamer and sugar bowl set
Made with high-quality, fine bone china
Manufacturer makes other china pieces in this pattern, so can be combined for a coordinating table
cons: A few users said it was smaller in size than they expected

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had decided to have a high tea with my granddaughters, and then added three more people. I wanted to have the table look as lovely as possible, so, with three days to go, I ordered some lovely ceramic items from Amazon. The sugar and creamer set were from Jusalpha. The arrived intact and beautiful, and on time. As I cleared the table, I noticed a problem with the application of the floral design. I requested a replacement and received it two days later. I used the original box and returned it through Kohl’s the next day. I am so happy to have this set for future tea times.
customer_reviews.author: JanH

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: While this is decent for the cost, coupled with a beautiful delicate design, critical product information is missing. I am some what disappointed it doesn't have a descriptive label at the bottom regarding it's composition. I had to carry out the so called "bone fine china test" and by that it appears legitimate. Call me OCD, but the creamer tip seems to have missed the mark ...... I do love the choice of pastels. My plan is to mix and match with other finds from Royal Albert and some from Antique shops.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous in person!
customer_reviews.text: This is dainty and darling yet still the perfect size for daily use. The images dont do it justice as its so much prettier than I was even expecting in real life! My only complaint is that there isnt a slot for the sugar spoon, however I wasnt vexed by that enough to detract a star. I would totally buy more tea items from this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: It's little bit small but looks great with entire set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute set. It's little bit small but looks great with entire set, nice pastel mint blue color came in a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Cute vintage style
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, vintage style set. They're small and adequate to compose a beautiful tea tray.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very delicate and small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these for everyday use, but they are so small and delicate that I am now using them as cute decorative items in my living room entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: So delicate
customer_reviews.text: The sugar bowl and creamer are so beautiful....I bought for my mother and she is afraid to use them due to how beautiful and delicate. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to add them to my Jusalpha tea collection. They are just beautiful. They come securely package and you can put them away in the same small box.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Petite Fine China
customer_reviews.text: The petite fine china sugar and creamer are adorable! They were smaller than I had envisioned, but they look darling on my table.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is a gift to be presented at Thanksgiving. I like how it looks and feels and hope the recipient will like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creamer set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I like it so much that I intend to assemble an entire set of this pattern for my collection. Well made and packaged perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THESE WITH THE TEASET FOR MY DAUGHTERS TEA PARTY BIRTHDAY PARTY THEY ARE BEYOND PERFECT WE LOVE THEM !!!!! PERFECT KEEPSAKE
customer_reviews.author: SISSYLIZ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this vendor.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time. Packaging was extremely well done. China looks beautiful and is just what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my wife its very cute like everyone else its smaller than i expected but she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife its very cute like everyone else its smaller than i expected but she does not mind and she is happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: konstantine payida

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommendable!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! And the packing was absolutely perfect! I recommend this seller for asian consumers who are interested in English tea culture!
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pieces. Arrived well boxed and safe and sound!!!! Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: G. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Such a sweet set!  Love it! 🌺🌸🌼
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Lovely sugar bowl and creamer. Just what I wanted! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as Promised!
customer_reviews.text: 60 pieces, 20 matching sets, arrived as promised. Each set of tea cup, saucer and luncheon plate was beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: A Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! It arrived promptly and is exactly as pictured. Just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Charming sugar and creamer set - beautiful quality and detail.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Selkoe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Creamer & Sugar Set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for my daughter to complete her mis-matched china tea set, and they are SO perfect! Even prettier than I expected. I'm thinking of purchasing another set for myself! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Silverleaf Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sweet! Definitely bone china. The creamer holds 6 oz. The sugar bowl holds 1/4 cup sugar cubes
customer_reviews.text: This sugar bowl + creamer is a sweet set. I am enjoying this cream & Sugar set, as it matches my Royal Albert Lady Carlyle tea cups! The Creamer is a delight to pour cream from! Just the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mantele

customer_reviews.title: Darling Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set. Exactly the size I needed. Only problem, there is a tiny chip in the rim of the sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Woodford

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet set that is perfect for a child’s tea party or for an elegant tea for two. They are small but looks nice on the table.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and dainty set
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for a co-worker. She was thrilled with it. It appears just as pictured. Check the dimensions, it seemed a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant creamer set
customer_reviews.text: For all the reasons listed, a great product to purchase or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Blue eyes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the cutest sugar bowls and creamers I have ever seen! It goes with my tiny eclectic tea set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern but was looking for something a little larger. However, they are a beautiful addition to my china teapot and cups. Everything was nicely packaged and arrived on time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned about how good these would be based on the price. But when I received them they are absolutely flawless! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful completion for my gorgeous Matching teapot and cup
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful completion for my gorgeous Matching teapot and cup. I wish the sale plate was available in this pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful set. Bought the tea pot that goes with it.
customer_reviews.author: NessArteaga86

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful must have tea set
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful set for my daughters tea party. But too beautiful to not complete the set to just have myself as I had fallen in love with them. Will certainly buy more from this collection. Nothing came cracked or broken . Packed good. Arrived quick. Many many compliments:)
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Omar

product_meta.title: Jusalpha Elegant Floral Fine Bone China Sugar and Creamer Set (Sugar and Creamer Set 01)
feature_bullets: 【PREMIUM QUALITY】: Handmade tea set from high quality ceramic so you can enjoy your favorite hot tea in style.
【THE SPOTLIGHT AT TEA PARTY】 Eye catching style and fine prints become the spotlight at all your tea parties.
【DAZZLING GIFT】: This interesting tea set is a nice choice for your friends, coworkers and family.
Package includes a creamer and a sugar bowl.
